statements: SELECT * FROM movies
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, title FROM movies WHERE rating > 8
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT id, rating FROM movies WHERE title LIKE 'A%'
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT id, title, rating FROM movies WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE title LIKE 'The%' OR title LIKE '%Movie'
SELECT id, title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating < 3.5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating >= 3 AND rating <= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM Movies ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT title, rating FROM HighlyRatedMovies WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE title LIKE 'The%'
SELECT title FROM HighlyRatedMovies ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies WHERE title LIKE '%re%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT movie_id, title, rating FROM Movies WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5;
SELECT * FROM HighlyRatedMovies WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, rating FROM movies ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM users WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE rating > 8.0 AND genre = 'Drama';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre='Comedy' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, genre, rating FROM movies WHERE genre='Action' AND rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating > 3.0 ORDER BY movie_id, user_id;
SELECT title, genre, rating FROM movies JOIN ratings ON movies.id = ratings.movie_id WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT users.name, movies.title, ratings.rating FROM users JOIN ratings ON users.id = ratings.user_id JOIN movies ON ratings.movie_id = movies.id WHERE movies.genre='Drama' AND users.age > 25 ORDER BY ratings.rating DESC;
SELECT movie_name, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 3.5 ORDER BY movie_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name;
SELECT movie_name, rating, genre_name FROM movies JOIN genres ON movies.rating = genres.genre_id;
SELECT movie_name, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY movie_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_rating FROM users INNER JOIN ratings ON users.user_id = ratings.user_id WHERE user_rating < 4.0 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT movie_name, genre_name FROM movies INNER JOIN genres ON movies.genre_id = genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Action' AND rating > 7.5 ORDER BY movie_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) as total_ratings FROM users INNER JOIN ratings ON users.user_id = ratings.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT genre_name, AVG(rating) as average_rating FROM genres INNER JOIN movies ON genres.genre_id = movies.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT id, title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT title FROM movies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ratings ORDER BY stars DESC;
SELECT title, name FROM movies JOIN movie_genres ON movies.id = movie_genres.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genres.genre_id = genres.id;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT m.title, r.stars, r.comments FROM movies m JOIN movie_ratings mr ON m.id = mr.movie_id JOIN ratings r ON mr.rating_id = r.id;
SELECT g.name, COUNT(*) AS total_movies FROM genres g JOIN movie_genres mg ON g.id = mg.genre_id GROUP BY g.name ORDER BY total_movies DESC;

SELECT m.title, r.stars, r.comments, g.name AS genre_name FROM movies m JOIN movie_ratings mr ON m.id = mr.movie_id JOIN ratings r ON mr.rating_id = r.id JOIN movie_genres mg ON m.id = mg.movie_id JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.id ORDER BY m.title ASC, r.stars DESC;
